suggestions.original: To enhance the deformation dimension and create a more cohesive artistic expression, consider applying similar stylized deformations to other elements in the artwork. For instance, you could exaggerate the shapes and proportions of the red mat and the black walls, making them more whimsical and less realistic. Additionally, incorporating more abstract or distorted elements in the background can help integrate the deformed dog into the overall composition, creating a more unified and impactful piece.
